definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: Where can I recharge my card, please?
sentences.chinese: 請問交通卡充值在哪裏？

sentences.english: Users can buy refill card at retail and add credit to the pre-paid account.
sentences.chinese: 用戶可以購買充值卡，給預付費賬號充值。

sentences.english: Users can buy refill card at retail and add credit to the pre-paid account.
sentences.chinese: 用戶可以購買充值卡，給預付費賬號充值。

sentences.english: Chongzhi not fixed to the time, depending on the amount of electricity consumption.
sentences.chinese: 去充值的時間不固定，取決於用電量的多少。

sentences.english: You can buy credit at the business center.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在商務中心購買充值點數。

sentences.english: I will buy a top-up card today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天要買張充值卡了。

sentences.english: When you finished, you can recharge with a prepaid card.
sentences.chinese: 當你用完後，用充值卡充值就可以。

sentences.english: When you finished, you can recharge with a prepaid card.
sentences.chinese: 當你用完後，用充值卡充值就可以。

sentences.english: Did you keep the used credit rechargeable card ?
sentences.chinese: 您還留着以前用過的充值卡嗎？

sentences.english: I'm going to top up my public transportation card.
sentences.chinese: 我打算充值一下我的交通卡。

sentences.english: You can buy recharge card in Business Center.
sentences.chinese: 您好，商務中心有充值卡出售。

sentences.english: and you top up your phone and you know, whatever it is.
sentences.chinese: 給電話卡充值，無論什麼事。

sentences.english: Where can I recharge my transportation card?
sentences.chinese: 請問我得到哪裏去給我的交通卡充值？

sentences.english: Do you sell fee recharging card?
sentences.chinese: 請問您這裏有賣手機充值卡嗎？

sentences.english: Would you be kind enough to show me the way to the post office?
sentences.chinese: 請你告訴我去郵如何做虛擬充值局的路好嗎？

definition: (Tw) to put money into (a stored-value card or pre-paid phone account)/to top up
to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)
to transfer (money to a bank account)
online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
to draw a prize/a lottery/a raffle
to withdraw money/to take money out of the bank
to pay a sum of money/payment
